    • Uses of EmailDetails in com.brightywe.brightylist.email.model.domain

      Classes in com.brightywe.brightylist.email.model.domain that implement EmailDetails 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EmailQueue
      Class EmailQueue as database entity for storing reminder e-Mails to be sent via The Twilio SendGrid.
      class  OverdueEmailQueue
      Class EmailQueue as database entity for storing overdue task e-Mails to be sent via The Twilio SendGrid.

    • Uses of EmailDetails in com.brightywe.brightylist.email.service

      Methods in com.brightywe.brightylist.email.service with parameters of type EmailDetails 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void EmailSendingService.actionEmailSent​(EmailDetails email)
      increases email_daily_count for current day, deletes email from database
      void EmailSendingService.actionFailedToSend​(EmailDetails email)
      increases failure_count for EmailDetails email
      com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.Mail EmailSendingService.createMail​(EmailDetails email)
      Creates e-Mail to be sent from EmailDetails
      void EmailSendingService.deleteEmailQueue​(EmailDetails email)
      Deletes email wich is instance of EmailDetails from proper table from databese.
      void EmailSendingService.sendEmail​(EmailDetails email, java.lang.Long resentLimit)
      Send e-Mail with respect to EMAIL_DAILY_LIMIT
      boolean EmailSendingService.sendMailViaSendGrid​(EmailDetails email)
      Sends e-Mail via The Twilio SendGrid, on succes increases email_daily_count for current day, on failure increases failure_count for EmailDetails email
      void EmailSendingService.updateEmailQueue​(EmailDetails email)
      Updates email wich is instance of EmailDetails from proper table from databese.
